meanings.sent1: She carefully unmiters the frame to adjust the angle.

meanings.definition: To make less severe or intense.
meanings.sent1: Taking a break can unmiters the stress of a busy day.
meanings.sent2: Adding sugar can unmiters the bitterness of the coffee.
meanings.sent3: A good laugh can unmiters a tense situation quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile unmiters the seriousness of the room, bringing warmth to all.
meanings.sent5: A kind gesture can unmiters the sadness in someone's heart.
